title: 결과 강조 - 성공적 결과
description: 성공적인 결과와 성취를 강조하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: This is amazing! We totally nailed it!
It's beyond expectations. It really worked out well.
It's like a dream result. I can't believe it.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 성공적 결과 표현 구사

sentences.en: This is amazing! We totally nailed it!
It's beyond expectations. It really worked out well.
It's like a dream result. I can't believe it.

sentences.kr: 완벽한 마무리야. 이보다 좋을 순 없어.
sentences.en: It's a perfect finish. It couldn't be better than this.

sentences.kr: 모든 게 딱 맞아떨어졌어. 운도 좋았고.
sentences.en: Everything fell into place perfectly. We were lucky too.
It's a truly excellent achievement. Everyone did great.
It's a result that exceeds expectations. Amazing.
This is the result we hoped for, and it really happened.
